description: Improved HNSW index warning logging in file watcher. Changed "HNSW index not loaded" from WARNING to DEBUG level since it's expected behavior during initial indexing. The HNSW index loads on-demand (first semantic search call), so file watcher warnings were misleading. Now only actual errors show as warnings. Added explanatory message: "HNSW index not yet loaded (loads on first semantic search, embeddings saved to SQLite)".
